oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CBHS Presents "The Importance of Being Earnest: A Trivial Comedy for Serious People," by Oscar Wilde
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performances; Programs; Comedies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The high school division of Christian Brothers College staged a performance of Oscar Wilde's "Importance of Being Earnest" in the CBC Green Room on October 6th, 7th, and 8th, 1957.
